subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: The defending champion Novak Djokovic rallied after a rain delay Saturday to beat Roger Federer, 4-6, 6-3, 6-3, in the semifinals of the Rome Masters, extending Federer’s title drought to seven months.
snippet: The defending champion Novak Djokovic rallied after a rain delay Saturday to beat Roger Federer, 4-6, 6-3, 6-3, in the semifinals of the Rome Masters, extending Federer’s title drought to seven months.
